attributes.action: Put an end to INSET days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a parent I am sick to death at having to either set aside 5 days of my precious holiday entitlement or pay for childcare in order that Teachers can attend staff training. Teachers are entitled to 13 weeks holiday per year. It is time that this staff training was carried out during one of those weeks & not at my expense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
